description: Extract structured data from URLs using AI-guided prompts and optional schemas.

api_key.info: The API key to use Firecrawl API.

urls.info: List of URLs to extract data from (separated by commas or new lines).

prompt.info: Prompt to guide the extraction process. Describe what information you want to extract from the pages.

schema.info: Optional schema to define the structure of the extracted data. Must be a valid JSON schema with a 'type' field.

enable_web_search.info: When true, the extraction will use web search to find additional data beyond the provided URLs.

ignore_sitemap.info: When true, sitemap.xml files will be ignored during website scanning.

include_subdomains.info: When true, subdomains of the provided URLs will also be scanned and extracted.

show_sources.info: When true, the sources used to extract the data will be included in the response.

errors.import_failed: Could not import firecrawl integration package. Please install it with `pip install firecrawl-py`.

logs.enhanced_prompt: {prompt}. Please extract all instances in a comprehensive, structured format.
logs.schema_invalid: Schema provided but does not have valid structure, skipping
logs.app_initialized: Firecrawl app initialized with API key
